previous.excerpt: Developers interested in creating applications and experiences for augmented reality, should check out the Mutrics ARiC open source augmented reality glasses, specifically created for the development process.
previous.title: Mutrics ARiC - Open source all in one AR glasses for developers

localize.description: 有兴趣为增强现实创建应用和体验的开发者，应该看看Mutrics ARiC开源增强现实眼镜，这是专门为开发过程创建的。
localize.tagline: 为开发者提供开源的一体化AR眼镜

localize.description: 有興趣爲增強現實創建應用和體驗的開發者，應該看看Mutrics ARiC開源增強現實眼鏡，這是專門爲開發過程創建的。
localize.tagline: 爲開發者提供開源的一體化AR眼鏡

next.excerpt: Sharing in Clubhouse should be fast, easy, and convenient. That’s where we come in. Pick a hashtag. Share it in your room. Drop a link. Drop a question. Dropit.
next.title: Dropit for Clubhouse - Sharing in Clubhouse made easy

localize.description: 会所里的分享应该是快速、简单、方便的。这就是我们的优势所在。选择一个标签。在你的房间里分享它。放一个链接。提出一个问题。Dropit.
localize.tagline: 在会所里分享，让你轻松自在

localize.description: 會所裏的分享應該是快速、簡單、方便的。這就是我們的優勢所在。選擇一個標籤。在你的房間裏分享它。放一個鏈接。提出一個問題。Dropit.
localize.tagline: 在會所裏分享，讓你輕鬆自在
